text: @washingtonpost Have the WH explain covid19’s presence in Australia, The Middle East & Africa, places that get plenty of sunlight & heat. Then explain their theory, aka 45pp✳️‘s idiotic suggestion, which he’s perpetuated from the beginning of the crisis.
